function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to nature in urban areas leading to reduced restoration and well-being","Impact":"Decreased mental and physical health, increased stress and cognitive fatigue","Mitigation":"Increase access to urban green spaces, promote nature-based interventions, and enhance biodiversity in urban areas","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, urban planning and design tools, nature-based solutions","People":"Urban residents, especially those living in densely populated or highly urbanized areas","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, and local government"},{"Description":"Disturbance, fragmentation, and isolation of urban green spaces impacting wildlife support","Impact":"Decreased biodiversity, loss of habitats, and disruption of ecosystem functions","Mitigation":"Implement wildlife-friendly design principles, create wildlife corridors, and minimize disturbance in urban green spaces","Technologies":"Biodiversity monitoring technologies, GIS mapping, wildlife monitoring cameras","People":"Ecologists, urban planners, wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Urban planners, wildlife conservation organizations, and local government"}]}
